trans-unit.source: Specifies which algorithm is used to scale bitmap images.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用哪种算法来缩放位图图像。

trans-unit.source: When animating the scale of any bitmap, the default high-quality image re-sampling algorithm can sometimes consume sufficient system resources to cause frame rate degradation.
trans-unit.target: 当对任何位图的缩放进行动画处理，默认高质量映像重新采样算法有时可能会使用足够的系统资源来导致帧速率下降。

trans-unit.source: This frame rate degradation can cause animations to skip frames or stutter.
trans-unit.target: 此帧速率下降可能会导致动画以跳过帧或明显变慢。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RenderOptions.BitmapScalingMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RenderOptions> object to LowQuality you can create a smoother animation when scaling a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.RenderOptions.BitmapScalingMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Media.RenderOptions>对象传递给 LowQuality 在缩放位图时，可以创建平滑的动画。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RenderOptions> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RenderOptions.BitmapScalingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use very high quality Fant bitmap scaling, which is slower than all other bitmap scaling modes, but produces higher quality output.
trans-unit.target: 使用非常高的质量 Fant 位图缩放，这比缩放模式下，所有其他位图慢，但产生更高版本的质量输出。

trans-unit.source: Use high quality bitmap scaling, which is slower than LowQuality mode, but produces higher quality output.
trans-unit.target: 使用高质量位图缩放，这是比 LowQuality 模式慢，但产生更高版本的质量输出。

trans-unit.source: The HighQuality mode is the same as the Fant mode.
trans-unit.target: HighQuality 模式是 Fant 模式相同。

trans-unit.source: Use linear bitmap scaling, which is faster than HighQuality mode, but produces lower quality output.
trans-unit.target: 使用线性位图缩放，这是比 HighQuality 模式下，更快，但输出质量较低。

trans-unit.source: Use bilinear bitmap scaling, which is faster than HighQuality mode, but produces lower quality output.
trans-unit.target: 这是比 HighQuality 模式下，更快，但输出质量较低，请使用双线性位图缩放，。

trans-unit.source: The LowQuality mode is the same as the Linear mode.
trans-unit.target: LowQuality 模式是线性的模式相同。

trans-unit.source: Use nearest-neighbor bitmap scaling, which provides performance benefits over LowQuality mode when the software rasterizer is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用最近邻域位图缩放，这在使用软件光栅器时，性能优势提供经 LowQuality 模式。

trans-unit.source: This mode is often used to magnify a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 此模式通常用于放大位图。

trans-unit.source: Use the default bitmap scaling mode, which is Linear.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认位图缩放模式下，这是线性。
